name: fullstack_part3
description: Part 3 exercises for Full Stack web dev

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf ./client/build && cd client && npm run build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'Full deploy' && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:backend: git add . && git commit -m 'Backend changes' && npm run deploy

author: Matteo Calabrese
